mrkn commented on pull request #6667: ARROW-8162: [Format][Python] Add serialization for CSF sparse tensors to Python
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6667#discussion_r406263572
 
 

 ##########
 File path: cpp/src/arrow/python/deserialize.cc
 ##########
 @@ -442,9 +451,15 @@ Status GetSerializedFromComponents(int num_tensors,
 
     std::shared_ptr<SparseTensor> sparse_tensor;
     ARROW_ASSIGN_OR_RAISE(sparse_tensor, ipc::internal::ReadSparseTensorPayload(payload));
+    csf_index_buffers += 2 * sparse_tensor->ndim() - 1;
 
 Review comment:
   I guess this should be calculated only for CSF tensors.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

fields.description: Once [ARROW-7428|https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7428] is complete serialization for CSF sparse tensors should be enabled in Python too.
fields.summary: [Format][Python] Add serialization for CSF sparse tensors
